Articles.Content:
We have well above the recommended specs but in most areas we are getting less than 10 fps   On the launch pad it’s under 5.  In the VAB it’s under 15

anyone else experiencing this?

I have a RTX 2060, I have around 20-30 fps most of the time, sometimes less, sometimes I go to 60fps. 1080p medium settings.

I tried going 4K, no way, not enough FPS for that.
